word_mean_info__list.difference: 最普通，最通俗用词，侧重失去精神上的平静，心理上完全丧失平衡。
书面语用词，指使人焦急烦恼，扰得心情不安。
侧重指内心的焦虑，难于控制，表露于外。
指因某人的行动、扰乱、妨碍安静等而使人不得安宁。

word_group.brief_definition: 制造麻烦, 打乱计划(或安排等)
最低售价；底价；起价；开拍价
胃部不适；胃难受；肚子难受
心烦意乱的时间表；打乱时间表

bilingual.source: I don't like to see her upset.
bilingual.target: 我不喜欢看到她难过的样子。
难过的在英语中是什么意思？

bilingual.source: It's difficult to say. Generally speaking, I like reminiscence only when I was upset.
bilingual.target: 很难说是否喜欢怀旧，一般来说，只有当我难过的时候才会喜欢怀旧。

bilingual.source: Try not to show anger or fear. Students who bully like to see that they can upset you.
bilingual.target: 当你被欺负的时候，不要把你很生气的样子暴露给他们，因为那个欺负的学生就是想看到你这样难过的样子。 。

bilingual.source: We had to risk you becoming upset while we waited for you to get used to the situation with time and with more experience.
bilingual.target: 我们冒着让你难过的风险，希望等你慢慢习惯后，能够逐渐适应这些状况。

bilingual.source: This lesson is difficult for women because on Venus one of the golden rules was never to abandon a friend when she was upset.
bilingual.target: 这个学习课程对女人而言十分困难，因为金星上的黄金定律之一是，从不遗弃难过的朋友。

bilingual.source: The last thing we want is for couples to wait on line for hours and hours, only to walk away upset on what was supposed to be the happiest day of their lives.
bilingual.target: 我们最不愿看到的就是情侣们在线上一小时又一小时地等待，然后在他们本该快乐结婚的那天难过的走开。

bilingual.source: Alex's mum and dad were very upset.
bilingual.target: 亚历克斯的爸爸妈妈非常难过。
她低声说：“马塞尼亚很难过。”

bilingual.source: The images or information could upset some people.
bilingual.target: 图片或信息可能会让一些人感到不安。

list.abstract: upset（英[ʌpˈset , ˈʌpset]，美[ʌpˈset , ˌʌpˈset , ˈʌpset]），英语单词，作动词为使心烦意乱，使失望，使苦恼。作名词为心烦意乱，失望，苦恼。作形容词为心烦的，失望的，苦恼的。短语搭配有get upset（心烦）。相关例句有“It is trying to upset Google.（它试图颠覆谷歌。）” upset及物动词类近义词有disorder、subvert。
Upset（1999年-—），欧洲《英雄联盟》电竞选手，担任下路。现效力于KC战队。 他曾在2019年和2018年两度有机会杀入世界赛，但两次都折戟在冒泡赛。今年OG在春季赛成绩不错的情况下，夏季赛后半程拉跨，最后以联赛倒数第一收尾，无缘季后赛。2021年8月30日，随FNC战队获得2021LEC夏季赛亚军。 2024年1月4日，KC战队宣布下路选手Upset正式加入。

yingyinNormal.en: Amy, I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to upset you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米，真是对不起，我不是故意让你难过的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I understand it's hard to tell someone something if you think it's gonna upset them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白，那些会让人难过的事是挺难说出口的。

yingyinNormal.en: Upset? I'm not upset. What makes you think I'm upset?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不开心? 我没有不开心啊！我为什么不开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you so upset? Why aren't you more upset?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么这么生气？难道你不该更生气吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So why are you upset?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你为什么不开心?

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be upset, Will. Clients lie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别沮丧，威尔，有些委托人确实会撒谎。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're that upset, go get her back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你这么难过，就把她追回来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it really worth getting upset about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 值得那么难过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But am I upset? No, I am not! A little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会为这个紧张吗？不会！虽然有那么一丁点

yingyinNormal.en: I understand. You eat when you are upset.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白你的心思，不开心的时候就吃。

yingyinNormal.en: Really, I am not upset about Leonard and Priya.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的，我对莱纳德和普丽娅的事毫不伤心。

yingyinNormal.en: Something, unfortunately, that might upset Diane's confirmation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不幸的是，有些事实可能会对戴安的职位确认不利。

yingyinNormal.en: Decision made. Andy, stop, stop. Look, right now, you're just upset. Do I look upset? I'm clear. I'm clear as a bell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我心意已决。安迪，停下，停下。你现在只是很灰心。我看起来灰心吗？我很清醒。我很清楚在做什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no, were you upset? Did you lose sleep? I'm so sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，你很难过？你睡不着吗？我很抱歉。

yingyinNormal.en: She'll get upset. And honestly I'm a little terrified of her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她肯定会生气，老实说，我真有点怕她。

yingyinNormal.en: Here, let me help you. Sorry about that. Yeah, you must be upset.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来，我来帮你，对不起啊，不生气是不可能的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's nonsense. You name one little change I was upset with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡说。举个我对小改变不开心的例子。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Rach, calm down, okay? She's really upset, we're just talking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，你别激动，她心情很差，我们只是在聊天。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. You're going out with Kathy. Yeah. Why are you getting so upset?
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢着，你要跟凯西见面？对，你干嘛这么不安？

yingyinNormal.en: So is it gonna be, like, I'm abandoning you while you're upset? No. No?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那这样会不会变成我在你难过时离你而去？不会。不会？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: make someone unhappy, disappointed, or worried

examination_example.sentence: But if you discontinue that transition, you're going to have your most loyal customers really <highlight>upset</highlight> with you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是如果你停止这种转变，你将会让你最忠实的顾客对你非常失望。

examination_example.sentence: Elisabeth was <highlight>upset</highlight> bythe consequences of the current sorting mechanism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伊丽莎白对当前分类机制的后果感到不安。

examination_example.sentence: They gave justices permanent positions so they would be free to <highlight>upset</highlight> those in power and have no need to cultivate political support.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给了法官永久的职位，这样他们就可以自由地扰乱当权者，而不需要培养政治支持。

examination_example.sentence: California has asked the justices to refrain from a sweeping ruling, particularly one that <highlight>upsets</highlight> the old assumption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州要求大法官不要做出大范围的裁决，尤其是推翻旧假设的裁决。

examination_example.sentence: The decision was an 8-0 defeat for the Administration's effort to <highlight>upset</highlight> the balance of power between the federal government and the states.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一决定是政府试图打破联邦政府和各州之间权力平衡的8比0失败。

word_usage.usage: upset作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或者代词，如：upset a lot of people，；也可用于被动结构

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>upset</highlight> to learn that many sea animals eat plastic garbage, thinking it is food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我得知许多海洋动物把塑料垃圾当作食物来吃时，我很沮丧。

examination_example.sentence: He was very <highlight>upset</highlight> that he couldn't earn enough money to support his family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很沮丧，因为他赚不到足够的钱来养家。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 使某人生气；打乱；推翻，弄翻；打败；翻倒；（upset的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 使心烦意乱；使失望；使苦恼；弄翻；打翻；镦锻；镦粗；打乱；扰乱；使（肠胃）不适

sense_info_list.zh: 难过的; 失望的; 沮丧的

examination_example.sentence: He's probably <highlight>upset</highlight> at the moment, too.
Not every adult is sad about losing something, but I was very <highlight>upset</highlight> about losing my wallet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不是每个成年人都为丢了东西而难过，但我为丢了钱包而非常难过。

examination_example.sentence: Are there any good ways to give bad news without making people too <highlight>upset</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有什么好方法可以在不让人太难过的情况下给出坏消息？

examination_example.sentence: Keep in  mind that forgiveness does not necessarily mean becoming friends again with the person who <highlight>upset</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记住，原谅并不一定意味着和让你烦恼的人再次成为朋友。

examination_example.sentence: Remember that forgiveness does not mean it is necessary to become friends again with the person who <highlight>upset</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记住，原谅并不意味着有必要和让你烦恼的人重新成为朋友。

examination_example.sentence: At first, the idea of clearing tables <highlight>upset</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，清理桌子的主意让我很烦恼。
